org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern

Class MarkerPatternConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern.AbstractPatternConverter
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern.LogEventPatternConverter
        • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.pattern.MarkerPatternConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PatternConverter

    @Plugin(name="MarkerPatternConverter",
        category="Converter")
public final class MarkerPatternConverter
extends LogEventPatternConverter
    Returns events' full marker string in a StringBuilder.
